MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 2:44PM in the LL65 and LL77 postcode areas of Holyhead and Llangefni following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:16PM on 19th April 2021
